<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGEN: do NOT edit in this block -->

**command: `/tp`**

**quick ref:**
> /tp [x] [y] [z]

**description:**

```
teleport to a given position. 
format: /tp [x] [y] [z]  
format: /tp [y]  -- teleport to y
format: /tp  -- teleport to current position (making a checkpoint)
format: /tp home -- teleport to home   
```

<!-- END_AUTOGEN-->
